Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP034
Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP034.client

Class RequestManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP034.client.RequestManager
Direct Known Subclasses:
CLI, GUIRequestHub
public abstract class RequestManager
extends Object
Abstract class extended by each Request Manager (CLI or GUI)

  • Method Details

    • handleRequest

      public abstract void handleRequest​(Request message) throws GameException
      Handles a single request (synchronously).
      Parameters:
      message - Request to be handled.
      Throws:
      GameException - Thrown if there has been a client error.

    • showError

      public abstract void showError​(ErrorMessage error)
      Displays an error. Can be called asynchronously.
      Parameters:
      error - Error to be shown.

    • setSender

      public void setSender​(ClientGameHandler sender)
      Sets instance used to send answers.
      Parameters:
      sender - Reference to ClientGameHandler used by a client

    • sendAnswer

      public void sendAnswer​(Answer answer)
      Sends an answer through a previously set ClientGameHandler.
      Parameters:
      answer - Answer to be sent.

    • canHandleRequest

      public abstract boolean canHandleRequest()
      Returns message handling availability.
      Returns:
      true if this instance of the RequestHub can manage a new request (handleRequest(Request)), false otherwise.

    • createConnection

      public Future<Boolean> createConnection​(AnswerIP answer)
      Creates the connection between the client and the server.
      Parameters:
      answer - Answer containing IP address and port.
      Returns:
      Future representing the result of the connection attempt.
